short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple color picker extension with english color names

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our Chrome extension - a groundbreaking tool designed to empower colorblind individuals with seamless color identification and naming. 

With the power of the Eyedropper APl at your fingertips, simply click to reveal the hex value of any color on your screen. Leveraging a sophisticated algorithm, our extension matches the selected color to its nearest counterpart in three meticulously curated arrays of named colors. From primary and secondary hues to a vast palette of 30,244 distinct shades, our extension ensures accurate color recognition and naming.

Say farewell to color ambiguity and embrace effortless color identification with our intuitive Chrome extension.
